name: Create Viral Loops participants from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new participant is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically add this participant to a selected Viral Loops campaign. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ez0iFI21bS4fC3gXSBgFQgmpZue2ZtlA6PA_o_lDT2M/edit?usp=sharing).
